articles.title: Police issue 'extremely urgent appeal' to track down missing 16-year-old - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jodie Bettany, from Ingoldmells, Lincolnshire, was last seen going to bed at her home on Wednesday night. Police believe she may have travelled to Merseyside.
articles.content:
